author: cnbc.com
title: OmniMax Holdings, Inc. Announces Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2017 Investor Call Information
text:
NORCROSS, Ga., April 02, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- OmniMax Holdings, Inc. announced today that it will host an investor conference call regarding its fourth quarter and full year 2017 financial results at 11:00 AM Eastern Time on Tuesday, April 10, 2018. Existing bond holders, qualified institutional investors and securities analysts can obtain dial-in information upon registration at the OmniMax Investor Relations website at http://www.omnimax.com/investor-relations .
Contact Information
OmniMax Holdings, Inc.
Mary S. Cullin, 770-449-7066
Senior Vice President, Chief Financial Officer and Treasurer
Email: mcullin@omnimax.com
Source:OmniMax International, Inc.
